CDFD Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 09 Technical Officer, Junior Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 17:11 IST
 Centre for DNA Fingerprinting and Diagnostics
 9 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Telangana |  Salary : 18,000 to 35,400




FOLLOW

The Centre for DNA Fingerprinting and Diagnostics (CDFD) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Technical Officers, Junior Assistants, Skilled Work Assistants, and  Junior Managerial Assistants. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc, M.Sc, Diploma, Any Degree, 12th, 10th, B.E./B. Tech, Post-graduation, can apply for the CDFD Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Telangana.

CDFD Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Technical Officer 	01	B.Sc., M.Sc
Technical Assistant	02	B.Sc, B.E./B. Tech, Post-graduation, Diploma
Junior Managerial Assistant	02	Any Degree
Junior Assistant	02	12th
Skilled Work Assistant	02	10th Pass

CDFD Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 30 Years.

Age Relaxation:

OBC Candidates: 3 Years.
SC, ST Candidates: 10 Years.

CDFD Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Skill Test.
Trade Test.
Document Verification.
Interview.

CDFD Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

All Other Candidates: Rs. 200/-
SC/ ST, Women, PWD Candidates: Nil

CDFD Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 18,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 35,400/- per month.
How to Apply for the CDFD Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the CDFD Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	25-08-2025
Closing date	30-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
